#!/bin/bash
# YAPFA Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

if [ ! -f server.properties ]; then
wget  https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/minecraft/java/server.properties
fi

sudo chmod 777 start.sh
